import React, { Component } from 'react' export class SignUp extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { finalData: { email: "", password: "" }, tempData: { email: "", pass1: "", pass2: "", password: "", agreed: false } } this.switchToSignUp = this.switchToSignUp.bind(this) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } switchToSignUp() { this.props.childSwitcher() } handleChange(event) { //egyszerűsíteni let copiedTempState = {...this.state} switch (event.target.name) { case "email": copiedTempState.tempData.email = event.target.value this.setState(copiedTempState) console.log(this.state) break case "pass1": copiedTempState.tempData.password = event.target.value this.setState(copiedTempState) console.log(this.state) break case "pass2": copiedTempState.tempData.password = event.target.value this.setState(copiedTempState) console.log(this.state) break default: console.log("ohh") } } handleSubmit(event) { let copiedTempState = {...this.state} copiedTempState.finalData = { email: copiedTempState.tempData.email, password: copiedTempState.tempData.password } this.setState(copiedTempState) console.log(this.state) this.props.signYouUp(this.state.finalData) event.preventDefault() } render() { return (

Sign Up

) } } export default SignUp
